Title: Melancholia
Overview: Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.
production_companies: Zentropa Entertainments, Det Danske Filminstitut, Danmarks Radio (DR), Memfis Film, Eurimages, Sveriges Television (SVT), Canal+, CinéCinéma, Slot Machine, Zentropa International Sweden, Zentropa International Köln, Liberator Productions, Swedish Film Institute, Centre National du Cinéma et de L'image Animée (CNC), Film i Väst, Filmstiftung Nordrhein-Westfalen, Legion Entertainment, Edition Video, Nordisk Film Distribution
Cast: Kirsten Dunst, Charlotte Gainsbourg, Kiefer Sutherland
